item.title: YouTube Voice Over Artist (NBA/Basketball Channel) - Upwork
item.description:
This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!
You will be responsible for narrating 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly

Below are links to reference channels for you to refer to that will give you a better understanding of the tone, word emphasis, speed, and level of quality we need from you.

1. REBOUND (https://www.youtube.com/@rebound)
2. Dime (https://www.youtube.com/@dime-)
3. HoopFlix (https://www.youtube.com/@HoopFlix)

Requirements:
1. English expert
2. Professional equipment
3. 36h or less turnaround time
4. Understanding of the channel’s personality (which is more comedic than serious)
5. Willing to work long term and grow with the team

(10 Voice Overs For $300)

Please provide samples of previous work to be considered for the position!
Look forward to receiving your work.


Budget: $300
Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:54 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over, Audio Editing, Male
Skills: Voice-Over, Audio Editing, Male
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Simple video edit / creation in 24 hours - Upwork
item.description:
I need a short video (total run time will end up being less than one minute) created that familiarizes customers with a product.  I have all of the raw footage, I just need a few shorts strung together and perhaps a few stills inserted.  I need some visual graphics as well.  I have made videos like this myself using Vimeo but I need it done in 24 hrs and I don't have the time do it myself.  I can provide all of the raw footage and a clear explanation of everything that I need including graphics etc.  When I do thie myself in Vimeo, it takes me about 1-2 hours.  For somebody that has experience in this sort of thing, I'm guessing the whole effort will take an hour or less.  The most important thing is that I need this by mid-morning tomorrow (7/2/2024).  I'm available to correspond all day today - so please only submit your interested if you have availability today.  Thanks.

Budget: $75
Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Demo Video, Audio Editing, Video Annotation, Video Cleanup, Visual Effects, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design
Skills: Demo Video, Audio Editing, Video Annotation, Video Cleanup, Visual Effects, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Firearms Review - YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for 8 minute long videos focusing on certain topics in the gun world. For instance, here are a few topics we would like to cover. Yes, this can become long-term work if the first few are successful and creative. Take a look below. I'm hoping to find someone experienced enough in firearms so models, politics and ammunition titles and numbers aren't foreign language please.

Examples:
- Top 5 popular Glocks
- Top 5 CCW
- Top 5 movie guns of all times (this can go into movies from the cowboy days to HEAT, etc.)
- Best S&W revolvers in 357 and why?
- Best SIG SAUER's for 2024
- If sometimes we want to go into the political to spark some comments we can talk about - What does the Sin Tax in California look like at the register? After July 1st, what can consumers do to adjust to the increase in taxes? Stop buying? No!
- Top 5 AR's for Home and why?
- Top 5 Lever Action - Henry, Marlin etc. and why?

Main goal is to launch 2-3 videos a week. Highly motivated to get this going.

Some References in style and quality.
Youtube.com/line45
Youtube.com/Allaboutsurvival

Budget: $35
Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe After Effects, YouTube Marketing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe After Effects, YouTube Marketing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: White Female UGC Actor for Social Media Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for White Female UGC Actors to film two short videos for us, for an ABA Clinic in Georgia. More details are provided in this document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MMdlnK1mkYXCJVs5ojuUUhTzp5qST_t-XEYa-B3yWc8/edit

Video Scripts:
Right now, we are looking for 2 videos, these are the questions:

Video 1: Who provides ABA therapy?

A BCBA (Board Certified Behavior Therapist) will conduct an assessment.  She will use the data from this assessment as well as the parents' concerns to create an individualized plan for the child. This will cover areas of behavior, learning, communications, social, life and independent skills.

The RBT (Registered Behavior Technician) is the child’s one-on-one therapist who will work on the goals designed by the BCBA daily. She will take data to ensure progress and effectiveness.

The BCBA will supervise the RBT and monitor and update the goals. She also has monthly or bi-monthly meetings with the parents and caregivers to go over goals, discuss progress, and answer any questions.

Video 2: When should a child start ABA therapy?

The research is always clear on the importance of starting young with early intervention. If a child begins working on communication skills during the years that he or she is supposed to be learning to communicate, the process will be much simpler, and the gap will be much smaller.

Children who begin ABA during the early intervention window (ages 0-6) will have stronger communication skills which often leads to less frustration and decreased behaviors.

If you give a child the support he or she needs as they develop, they will learn to function, communicate, and thrive. Delaying ABA therapy can cause increased delays, lack of communication, frustration, confusion, and increased and severe behaviors.




Budget: $200
Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:17 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Acting, Middle-Aged Adult, Female, English
Skills: Acting, Middle-Aged Adult, Female, English
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
